original_title: Three Times Moving: The Kiss Through Time
overview: In the first in a new trilogy that follows on from Time Stops Moving  and Time Always Moving, Adam begins to reveal a time that  involved a kiss and a lie- a time he tries to forget.  Starring Jane Hogan as “Julie”, Lee Neville as “Adam” and  Danielle Little as “Anna”.
tagline: Between a love that stopped and a love that was for always, was  love that wasn’t true. And time will reveal all with a kiss.
title: Three Times Moving: The Kiss Through Time
